featured.text: Also, I received this FAX this morning.
Fax resume and work samples, if any, to The China Post at (03) 2595-7962.
I’ll check the FAX office right away.

definition.zh_def: 傳真，通過電話線傳送的文件或圖像。
definition.en_def: A device or system that transmits printed material electronically over a telephone line.
definition.example: Please send the signed contract by fax to the office.
